pkgmetadata.longdescription: Clustering Online Datasets // A function for clustering online datasets. The number of cells is data-driven which need not to be chosen in advance by the user. The method is introduced and fully described in Le Li, Benjamin Guedj and Sebastien Loustau (2016), "PAC-Bayesian Online Clustering" (arXiv preprint: https://arxiv.org/abs/1602.00522).
